name: RecipeX
description: RecipeX is a full-stack web application where users can register, log in, and share their favorite recipes. It features a modern UI, secure authentication, and real-time recipe storage using MongoDB.
features: User registration and login with validation
Responsive UI built with React and CSS
Secure backend using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Recipe submission form with image and ingredient inputs
Dynamic navigation bar and route protection
alt: RecipeX - Full-stack recipe sharing platform with login and recipe submission
